name: indx
author: Jeff Escalante <hello@jenius.me>

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover _mocha --report html -- -R spec && open coverage/index.html
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
